I have the settings for timeout on a crawl to 2 minutes.  I notice 
this usually always works correctly.  It seems as though sometimes a 
crawl will last over the timelimit by an large amount, up to hours.  I 
was wondering does setting the timelimit cause an abrupt stop or does 
it wait until things that it may be currently downloading to finish.  
For example if it hit the timeout but was downloading a large ISO 
would it try to finish it before ending?  Thanks,
~chris
